languages.text: "Хотите, чтобы я раскрыл вам наших поставщиков?" {n}Аустериус беззлобно смеется.{/n} "Признаться по чести — отовсюду и ниоткуда. Компоненты для продажи попадают к нам от везунчиков, наткнувшихся на брошенное или полуразрушенное судно где-то в соседней системе, или от неудачников, чей корабль прибывает на Футфол в таком состоянии, что его проще комиссовать, чем восстанавливать".

traits.locale_text: "Хотите, чтобы я раскрыл вам наших поставщиков?" {n}Сервус беззлобно смеется.{/n} "Признаться по чести — отовсюду и ниоткуда. Компоненты для продажи попадают к нам от везунчиков, наткнувшихся на брошенное или полуразрушенное судно где-то в соседней системе, или от неудачников, чей корабль прибывает на Футфол в таком состоянии, что его проще комиссовать, чем восстанавливать".

languages.text: "Are you asking me to disclose our suppliers to you?" {n}Thorfast laughs airily.{/n} "Well, frankly, they come from both everywhere and nowhere. We get our wares either from lucky voidsmen who stumble upon an abandoned or dilapidated ship somewhere in a neighbouring system, or from unlucky ones whose sorry tub arrives on Footfall in such a state that it's easier to take her apart than to restore her."
languages.original_text: "Хотите, чтобы я раскрыл вам наших поставщиков?" {n}Аустериус беззлобно смеется.{/n} "Признаться по чести — отовсюду и ниоткуда. Компоненты для продажи попадают к нам от везунчиков, наткнувшихся на брошенное или полуразрушенное судно где-то в соседней системе, или от неудачников, чей корабль прибывает на Футфол в таком состоянии, что его проще комиссовать, чем восстанавливать".

traits.locale_text: "Are you asking me to disclose our suppliers to you?" {n}Thorfast laughs airily.{/n} "Well, frankly, they come from both everywhere and nowhere. We get our wares either from lucky voidsmen who stumble upon an abandoned or dilapidated ship somewhere in a neighbouring system, or from unlucky ones whose sorry tub arrives on Footfall in such a state that it's easier to take her apart than to restore her."

"Are you asking me to disclose our suppliers to you?" {n}Thorfast laughs airily.{/n} "Well, frankly, they come from both everywhere and nowhere. We get our wares either from lucky voidsmen who stumble upon an abandoned or dilapidated ship somewhere in a neighbouring system, or from unlucky ones whose sorry tub arrives on Footfall in such a state that it's easier to take her apart than to restore her."

"Are you asking me to disclose our suppliers to you?" {n}Thorfast laughs airily.{/n} "Well, frankly, they come from both everywhere and nowhere. We get our wares either from lucky voidsmen who stumble upon an abandoned or dilapidated ship somewhere in a neighbouring system, or from unlucky ones whose sorry tub arrives on Footfall in such a state that it's easier to take her apart than to restore her."

languages.text: 「我々の仕入れ先の情報を教えて欲しいって？」{n}ソーファストは陽気に笑う。{/n}「まあ、率直に言えば、どこにでもいるとも、どこもいないとも言えるかな。近くの星系で放棄されたり荒れ果てた船に偶然出くわしたラッキーなヴォイズマンから品物が入ることもある。もしくは、あまりにひどい状態でフットフォールにたどり着いたもんで、修理するよりバラした方が手っ取り早いようなアンラッキーな船の持ち主からってこともな」
languages.original_text: "Are you asking me to disclose our suppliers to you?" {n}Thorfast laughs airily.{/n} "Well, frankly, they come from both everywhere and nowhere. We get our wares either from lucky voidsmen who stumble upon an abandoned or dilapidated ship somewhere in a neighbouring system, or from unlucky ones whose sorry tub arrives on Footfall in such a state that it's easier to take her apart than to restore her."

traits.locale_text: 「我々の仕入れ先の情報を教えて欲しいって？」{n}ソーファストは陽気に笑う。{/n}「まあ、率直に言えば、どこにでもいるとも、どこもいないとも言えるかな。近くの星系で放棄されたり荒れ果てた船に偶然出くわしたラッキーなヴォイズマンから品物が入ることもある。もしくは、あまりにひどい状態でフットフォールにたどり着いたもんで、修理するよりバラした方が手っ取り早いようなアンラッキーな船の持ち主からってこともな」

languages.text: « Vous me demandez de vous dévoiler mes fournisseurs ? {n}demande Thorfast en riant.{/n} Eh bien, pour être honnête, ils viennent d'un peu partout. De cosmomarins qui sont tombés par hasard sur une épave dans un système voisin, par exemple, ou de malchanceux dont le vaisseau a accosté à Castel dans un si piteux état qu'il était plus facile de le désosser que de le réparer. »
languages.original_text: "Are you asking me to disclose our suppliers to you?" {n}Thorfast laughs airily.{/n} "Well, frankly, they come from both everywhere and nowhere. We get our wares either from lucky voidsmen who stumble upon an abandoned or dilapidated ship somewhere in a neighbouring system, or from unlucky ones whose sorry tub arrives on Footfall in such a state that it's easier to take her apart than to restore her."

traits.locale_text: « Vous me demandez de vous dévoiler mes fournisseurs ? {n}demande Thorfast en riant.{/n} Eh bien, pour être honnête, ils viennent d'un peu partout. De cosmomarins qui sont tombés par hasard sur une épave dans un système voisin, par exemple, ou de malchanceux dont le vaisseau a accosté à Castel dans un si piteux état qu'il était plus facile de le désosser que de le réparer. »

languages.text: “您是想让我透露我们的供应商吗？”{n}索法特爽朗地大笑起来。{/n}“老实说，我们的供应商无处不在，无处不有。我们的那些商品，可能会来自走运的船员，他们可能会在邻近星系的某个地方偶然发现了破旧不堪的废船。也有可能会来自某些倒霉的家伙，他们的飞船降落到了落脚港，已经破烂不堪，比起大修一番，还不如直接拆掉换条新的。”
languages.original_text: "Are you asking me to disclose our suppliers to you?" {n}Thorfast laughs airily.{/n} "Well, frankly, they come from both everywhere and nowhere. We get our wares either from lucky voidsmen who stumble upon an abandoned or dilapidated ship somewhere in a neighbouring system, or from unlucky ones whose sorry tub arrives on Footfall in such a state that it's easier to take her apart than to restore her."

traits.locale_text: “您是想让我透露我们的供应商吗？”{n}索法特爽朗地大笑起来。{/n}“老实说，我们的供应商无处不在，无处不有。我们的那些商品，可能会来自走运的船员，他们可能会在邻近星系的某个地方偶然发现了破旧不堪的废船。也有可能会来自某些倒霉的家伙，他们的飞船降落到了落脚港，已经破烂不堪，比起大修一番，还不如直接拆掉换条新的。”

languages.text: "Bittet Ihr mich, Euch unsere Lieferanten offenzulegen?" {n}Thorfast lacht unbekümmert.{/n} "Nun, offen gesagt, sie kommen von überall und nirgendwo. Wir erhalten unsere Ware entweder von Raumfahrern, die das Glück hatten, irgendwo in den Nachbarsystemen über ein verlassenes oder verfallenes Schiff zu stolpern, oder von Pechvögeln, deren eigener Kahn in so schlechtem Zustand in Footfall ankommt, dass es sinnvoller ist, ihn auszuschlachten als zu reparieren."
languages.original_text: "Are you asking me to disclose our suppliers to you?" {n}Thorfast laughs airily.{/n} "Well, frankly, they come from both everywhere and nowhere. We get our wares either from lucky voidsmen who stumble upon an abandoned or dilapidated ship somewhere in a neighbouring system, or from unlucky ones whose sorry tub arrives on Footfall in such a state that it's easier to take her apart than to restore her."

traits.locale_text: "Bittet Ihr mich, Euch unsere Lieferanten offenzulegen?" {n}Thorfast lacht unbekümmert.{/n} "Nun, offen gesagt, sie kommen von überall und nirgendwo. Wir erhalten unsere Ware entweder von Raumfahrern, die das Glück hatten, irgendwo in den Nachbarsystemen über ein verlassenes oder verfallenes Schiff zu stolpern, oder von Pechvögeln, deren eigener Kahn in so schlechtem Zustand in Footfall ankommt, dass es sinnvoller ist, ihn auszuschlachten als zu reparieren."

languages.text: «¿Me está pidiendo que le diga quienes son mis proveedores?». {n}Thorfast se ríe despreocupado.{/n} «Si le digo la verdad, vienen de todas partes y de ningún sitio en particular. Conseguimos nuestras mercancías ya sea de viajeros del vacío afortunados que encuentran una nave abandonada o en mal estado en algún sistema cercano, o de desafortunados que llegan a Paso con una nave en un estado tal que es más fácil desmontarla que repararla».
languages.original_text: "Are you asking me to disclose our suppliers to you?" {n}Thorfast laughs airily.{/n} "Well, frankly, they come from both everywhere and nowhere. We get our wares either from lucky voidsmen who stumble upon an abandoned or dilapidated ship somewhere in a neighbouring system, or from unlucky ones whose sorry tub arrives on Footfall in such a state that it's easier to take her apart than to restore her."

traits.locale_text: «¿Me está pidiendo que le diga quienes son mis proveedores?». {n}Thorfast se ríe despreocupado.{/n} «Si le digo la verdad, vienen de todas partes y de ningún sitio en particular. Conseguimos nuestras mercancías ya sea de viajeros del vacío afortunados que encuentran una nave abandonada o en mal estado en algún sistema cercano, o de desafortunados que llegan a Paso con una nave en un estado tal que es más fácil desmontarla que repararla».

languages.text: "Sağlayıcılarımızı size açık etmemi mi istiyorsunuz?" {n}Thorfast arsızca gülüyor.{/n} "Doğrusunu isterseniz her yerden sağlayıcımız var ama aynı zamanda hiçbir yerden de yok. Stoklarımızı ya komşu sistemlerde terk edilmiş veya hurdaya dönmüş gemilere denk gelen şanslı uçsuz erlerinden alıyoruz ya da Binliman'a, parçalarına ayırması tamir etmesinden daha kolay olan, hurda hâldeki gemilerle ulaşan şanssız uçsuz erlerinden alıyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Are you asking me to disclose our suppliers to you?" {n}Thorfast laughs airily.{/n} "Well, frankly, they come from both everywhere and nowhere. We get our wares either from lucky voidsmen who stumble upon an abandoned or dilapidated ship somewhere in a neighbouring system, or from unlucky ones whose sorry tub arrives on Footfall in such a state that it's easier to take her apart than to restore her."

traits.locale_text: "Sağlayıcılarımızı size açık etmemi mi istiyorsunuz?" {n}Thorfast arsızca gülüyor.{/n} "Yani doğrusunu isterseniz bütün her yerden geliyorlar ama aynı zamanda hiçbir yerden de gelmiyorlar. Stoklarımızı ya komşu bir sistemde terk edilmiş veya hurdaya dönmüş bir gemiye denk gelen şanslı uçsuz erlerinden alıyoruz, ya da Binliman'a, parçalarına ayırması tamir etmesinden daha kolay olan, perişan hâldeki konserve kutularıyla ulaşan şanssız uçsuz erlerinden alıyoruz."
